entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 2:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
